# ğŸ“ Blog Images Folder

Add your blog post featured images here.

## ğŸ“ Image Guidelines

- **Recommended Size:** 1200x630px (perfect for social media sharing)
- **Formats:** `.jpg`, `.png`, `.webp`
- **File Size:** Keep under 500KB
- **Naming:** Use lowercase with hyphens: `react-best-practices.jpg`

## ğŸ¯ Examples

```
react-security.jpg

```

## ğŸ’¡ Tips

- Use high-quality, relevant images
- 1200x630px is the ideal size for social media previews (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn)
- Free stock photos: [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/), [Pexels](https://pexels.com/)
- Compress images: [TinyPNG](https://tinypng.com/)

## ğŸ“ How to Use

1. Add your blog featured image to this folder
2. Open `src/data/blog.ts`
3. Reference: `image: "/images/blog/your-image.jpg"`

See `CONTENT_MANAGEMENT_GUIDE.md` for detailed instructions.
